recipe_text: Quantity; 4; Prepare 4 bell peppers, tops removed and seeded| Measurement; 450; Measure out 450 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cooked rice| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of tomato sauce| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)| Untimed; None; In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned| Untimed; None; Add onion and garlic to the skillet and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Stir in cooked rice, tomato sauce, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Stuff the mixture into the bell peppers| Untimed; None; Place the stuffed peppers in a baking dish| Untimed; None; Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the top of the peppers| Timed; 1800; Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Chef John's Stuffed Peppers
